review_en: I don't know where to go in and where to come out. It is a new world of curves that boldly broke away from the world of uprightness, beyond the basic form and order of existing buildings, without knowing where to start and finish. It's new from afar, new from the front, new from the inside, and new from the inside. This building, which is not easily used to, is more fun to browse through. If you don't want to be greedy and only get drunk with the novelty and wander in it three or four times, then the novelty of knowing a little and taking it will expand into pleasure.
